meanings.sent1: The esteemed professor received an award for his outstanding work.
meanings.sent2: She is an esteemed member of the community due to her charitable actions.
meanings.sent3: The esteemed cat in the neighborhood always wears a tiny top hat.
meanings.sent4: The esteemed oak tree stood tall, casting a protective shadow over the park.
meanings.sent5: The esteemed painting captured the attention of all who passed by.

meanings.sent1: The esteemed author's books are cherished by readers worldwide.
meanings.sent2: The team won the championship, making them an esteemed group in the sports world.
meanings.sent3: The esteemed squirrel in the park was known for its acrobatic skills on the trees.
meanings.sent4: The esteemed lighthouse guided ships safely through the stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The esteemed diamond sparkled brilliantly in the sunlight.
